tag_list: social-media, sports, politics, nydd, new-york-tech, social-media-agency
overview:
Mike Germano is a New York entrepreneur and former politician.

He currently serves as the CEO of Carrot Creative the company he co-founded in 2005 as the leader in Social Media Agencies. Mike also spearheaded the creation of the non-profit New York Digital District @NYDD where he currently serves on the board. Additional board appointments include Real Time Academy, F#, Prolific Interactive, Digital DUMBO.

Carrot Creative was the first Social Media marketing agency headquarters in Brooklyn New York with international offices. Prior to founding Carrot Creative Mike was the first politician to use Social Media to successfully get elected to public office.
